# PdfInput.CreateFromHtml method

Creates a new [`PdfInput`](../PdfInput.md) object from HTML code.

```csharp
public static PdfInput CreateFromHtml(string html, string css = null, Encoding encoding = null)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| html | HTML code to convert |
| css | CSS code to use with HTML code |
| encoding | Encoding to use |

## Return Value

A new [`PdfInput`](../PdfInput.md) object which contains the HTML code.
